column4: Does anyone have skype audio working on 8.04?  If not then I might as well put 7.10 back on here.
works for me
I have spent about 6 hours on this pulseaudio mess now.
but it won't use pulseaudio iirc.. I just uses alsa
it's not getting along
no audio output ?
yeah pretty much no audio either way
I tried getting rid of pulseaudio completely, then it would use dmix for audio output, but audio input was broken
so I reinstalled pulseadio
you've trying changing things in options, sound devices?
yeah
trying to use only dmix broke tons of other apps
now that pulseaudio is reinstalled, everything else works other than skype
well, and second life also fails, because it also tries to use alsa directly
pulseaudio is grabbing alsa exclusively
hmm.. I don't think pulseaudio grabs alsa like that.. at least it doesn't do that for me..
well it started doing it for me since I uninstalled and reinstalled it
I just select the soundcard I want to use in the options dialog and that works
don't really know what to do about it.. I'm no good with troubleshooting alsa... perhaps someone else knows
!ru | vlad
I really regret upgrading.
